api.name: EdgeEffect
api.description: Construct a new EdgeEffect with a theme appropriate for the provided context.

parameter.name: context
parameter.description: Context: Context used to provide theming and resource information for the EdgeEffect

api.name: draw
api.description: Draw into the provided canvas. Assumes that the canvas has been rotated accordingly and the size has been set. The effect will be drawn the full width of X=0 to X=width, beginning from Y=0 and extending to some factor < 1.f of height.

parameter.name: boolean
parameter.description: true if drawing should continue beyond this frame to continue the animation

api.name: finish
api.description: Immediately finish the current animation. After this call isFinished() will return true.

api.name: getColor
api.description: Return the color of this edge effect in argb.

parameter.name: int
parameter.description: The color of this edge effect in argb

api.name: getMaxHeight
api.description: Return the maximum height that the edge effect will be drawn at given the original input size.

parameter.name: int
parameter.description: The maximum height of the edge effect

api.name: isFinished
api.description: Reports if this EdgeEffect's animation is finished. If this method returns false after a call to draw(Canvas) the host widget should schedule another drawing pass to continue the animation.

parameter.name: boolean
parameter.description: true if animation is finished, false if drawing should continue on the next frame.

api.name: onAbsorb
api.description: Call when the effect absorbs an impact at the given velocity. Used when a fling reaches the scroll boundary.

parameter.name: velocity
parameter.description: int: Velocity at impact in pixels per second.

api.name: onPull
api.description: A view should call this when content is pulled away from an edge by the user. This will update the state of the current visual effect and its associated animation. The host view should always View.invalidate() after this and draw the results accordingly.

parameter.name: deltaDistance
parameter.description: float: Change in distance since the last call. Values may be 0 (no change) to 1.f (full length of the view) or negative values to express change back toward the edge reached to initiate the effect.

api.name: onPull
api.api_signature: public void onPull (float deltaDistance, float displacement)
api.description: A view should call this when content is pulled away from an edge by the user. This will update the state of the current visual effect and its associated animation. The host view should always View.invalidate() after this and draw the results accordingly.

parameter.name: deltaDistance
parameter.description: float: Change in distance since the last call. Values may be 0 (no change) to 1.f (full length of the view) or negative values to express change back toward the edge reached to initiate the effect.

parameter.name: displacement
parameter.description: float: The displacement from the starting side of the effect of the point initiating the pull. In the case of touch this is the finger position. Values may be from 0-1.

api.name: onRelease
api.description: Call when the object is released after being pulled. This will begin the "decay" phase of the effect. After calling this method the host view should View.invalidate() and thereby draw the results accordingly.

api.name: setColor
api.description: Set the color of this edge effect in argb.

api.name: setSize
api.api_signature: public void setSize (int width, int height)
api.description: Set the size of this edge effect in pixels.
